column1: Little Goat Diner////I am obsessed with Little Goat. I can't believe I haven't left a review yet. Every time we go we sit at the bar (open seating--grab a drink (start with a bloody mary) while you wait and be cutthroat and you will get a seat). Cinnamon buns and pork belly home fries are my go to starters (pork belly home fries are like meat croutons they're so good!) Amazing bougie brunch
column3: know what i mean? Great bartenders
column5: and atmosphere. And they have goat milk as an alternative milk option
